bibl.title: A "Plaketten" Neck-Amphora with Twisted Handles.
Classical Art in the Nicholson Museum, Sydney
bibl.author: PARLASCA, Klaus

bibl.note: Sydney, Nicholson Museum, Inv. 84.01. H. 43,8 cm. Provenience unknown (probably made by a migrant Athenian potter who worked in Alexandria), Early Hellenistic Period.
PARLASCA Klaus, A "Plaketten" Neck-Amphora with Twisted Handles.
Alexander CAMBITOGLOU and E.G.D. ROBINSON (Edd.), Classical Art in the Nicholson Museum, Sydney (Mainz, 1995) pp. 199-201 et pll. 62-64.
